title: Ticket #6449: job_lease_duration should have a default in the config system
description: currently the job_lease_duration submit parameter has a hard-coded default of 40*60. It should instead get its default out of the config system. A new config knob JOB_DEFAULT_LEASE_DURATION will be used for this. It will have a default value in the param table of 2400, but will be of type string since it can be an expression.
